name: 易英謨
objective:
介紹家具產銷體系從原始概念、產品發展以迄賣到最後消費者手中所涉及之種種。課程內容包括行銷研究、產品開發、標價計畫、配銷、廣告、促銷以及行銷計畫等。
An introduction to furniture production and marketing systems. Emphasis is on the role of marketing in a managerial context. Areas studied include: Product development, marketing research and information systems, pricing, advertising, promotion, distribution and inventory management.
